```{r pec}
library(tidyverse)
library(zoo)
library(lubridate)

index <- seq.Date(
  from = as_date("2016-01-01"),
  to = as_date("2016-12-31"),
  by = "day"
) %>% as.character()

index[240:270] <- format(as_date(index[240:270]), "%B %d, %Y")

data <- runif(366, max = 25) + 1:366

```


```{r}
test_ts <- zoo(data, index)
```

```{r}
index_parsed <- parse_date_time(
  index,
  orders = c("%Y-%m-%d", "%B %d, %Y")
)
index_parsed
```
